articles.title: Watch: Shoaib Akhtar Lands In Colombo, Fires Warning To Team India - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Shoaib Akhtar had warning for the Indian cricket team ahead of their Asia Cup 2023 match against Pakistan.
articles.content: Legendary Pakistan pacer Shoaib Akhtar had a warning for the Indian cricket team ahead of the India vs Pakistan Super 4 match at the Asia Cup 2023 on Sunday. Cricket fans around the world are eagerly… [+1460 chars]
